### getFirstMemoryWrite() {#af0b69a5d42b625148101e8fdd653ebee}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>const Instruction &#42; llvm::MemoryWriteTracking::getFirstMemoryWrite (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; BB)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Returns the topmost instruction that may write memory from the given basic block.

Returns nullptr if there is no such instructions in the block.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/instructionprecedencetracking-h/#l00125">125</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/instructionprecedencetracking-h">InstructionPrecedenceTracking.h</a>.

### isSpecialInstruction() {#ad4c4277cbea86cbea61789fa5b98d1ba}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool MemoryWriteTracking::isSpecialInstruction (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; Insn) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
A predicate that defines whether or not the instruction <code>Insn</code> is considered special and needs to be tracked.

Implementing this method in children classes allows to implement tracking of implicit control flow, memory writing instructions or any other kinds of instructions we might be interested in.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/instructionprecedencetracking-h/#l00141">141</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/instructionprecedencetracking-h">InstructionPrecedenceTracking.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/instructionprecedencetracking-cpp/#l00148">148</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/instructionprecedencetracking-cpp">InstructionPrecedenceTracking.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
